data.title: Weather Application
data.body: This project implimented API calls in order to display changing weather conditon over the text 5 days. Furthermore ive used JQuery to code the Javascript for this project.

data.title: Team Profile Generator - NodeJS
data.body: Using backend npm packages such as Inquirer, I created a question and response program that allows the user in input data and a HTML page in loaded from responses given.

data.title: Node_README_Generator - NodeJS
data.body: Using further backend technologies, this application creates a markdown file, a README, for any project. Rendering a Table of Contents at the top.

data.title: Daily Planner
data.body: Using DaysJS, this application updates dependant on the time of useage to allow the user to plan their day hour-by-hour, while not allowing the user to add plans for time gone by

data.title: Cocktail Bar - Team Project
data.body: This application carried out as a team project over two weeks. I was personally responsible for the Javascript functionality of the Map API - which works as intended

data.title: Quiz Application
data.body: A Quiz application that gives the user a select amount of time to answer certain questions, deducting time if the question is answered incorrectly
